title: Biden Set to Campaign With Terry McAuliffe Ahead of Virginia Election
sub_head: Polls have shown a tight race leading up to the Nov. 2 vote, which is seen as a political barometer before the midterm elections
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden is aiming to provide a boost to Terry McAuliffe’s bid for another term as governor of Virginia in the final days before an election that could influence Democrats’ outlook for next year’s midterm elections.
Mr. Biden is scheduled to campaign alongside Mr. McAuliffe Tuesday night at a park in Arlington, Va., about four miles from the White House, as the president’s negotiations with congressional Democrats intensify ahead of his coming European trip.
